member.name: T:softaware.Cqs.SoftawareCqsTransactionDecoratorBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods to add transaction aware decorators.

member.summary: Registers the transaction aware command handler decorator.

member.name: T:softaware.Cqs.Decorators.Transaction.TransactionAwareCommandHandlerDecorator`1
member.summary: A decorator for creating a for the command handler. The transaction gets committed when the decorated handler successfully executes.

member.name: T:softaware.Cqs.Decorators.Transaction.TransactionAwareQueryHandlerDecorator`2

member.typeparam: The type of the query to execute.
The type of the query result.
